name: B4E
description:
Jenny and Rose are two Absolute BFF Ultimate Collector Edition that both attend Smarstler university!

They're always together (since forever!) and are super supportive of each other!

But what if something isn't as genuine as it seems?...

--

Hello!

This is my game for Nanoreno 2022! I was sick half of the month so I had to cut a loooot of corners! Still! I had fun making that game and I hope it will be fun to play!

It is quite short, but fun! and cringe! lol
There is 6 1/2 endings! : p
